com.qoqa.widget.views.widgets

Class ListProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qoqa.widget.views.widgets.ListProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.RemoteViewsService.RemoteViewsFactory

    public class ListProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.widget.RemoteViewsService.RemoteViewsFactory
    Cette classe nous permet de remplir la liste de notre widget le principe est le même que pour les "Adapter"

      • getViewAt

        public android.widget.RemoteViews getViewAt(int position)
        Description copied from interface: android.widget.RemoteViewsService.RemoteViewsFactory
        See Adapter.getView(int, android.view.View, android.view.ViewGroup). Note: expensive tasks can be safely performed synchronously within this method, and a loading view will be displayed in the interim. See RemoteViewsService.RemoteViewsFactory.getLoadingView().
        Specified by:
        getViewAt in interface android.widget.RemoteViewsService.RemoteViewsFactory
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the item within the Factory's data set of the item whose view we want.
        Returns:
        A RemoteViews object corresponding to the data at the specified position.
